title: CLEAR_PED_TASKS
content:
0xDE3316AB// ClearPedTasks
void CLEAR_PED_TASKS(Ped ped);Parameters:ped: Ped id. Use PlayerPedId() for your own character.Clear a ped's tasks. Stop animations and other tasks created by scripts.This is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native CLEAR_PED_TASKS.
